Management.1: Understand and apply key management theories.
Management.2: Gather and evaluate data to make decisions that improve company performance, employee well-being, and stakeholder satisfaction.
Management.4: Understand the dynamics and effectiveness of individual and team processes in organizational settings
Management.5: Acquire knowledge of values, ethics and sustainability practices in organizations.
Management.6: Appreciate the importance of diverse viewpoints and cross-cultural competency.
Management.7: Use acquired knowledge and skills to critically examine novel situations and provide clear communication of choices and conclusions.
